summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 59th Street form 20th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by resurfacing; constructing wooden curbs and gutters; concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3774, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
